seo.title: AI Discovery Workshop | SSW
seo.description: 3-day AI Discovery Workshop in Sydney, Brisbane, Melbourne & Newcastle. Identify custom AI opportunities for your business. Discover bespoke solutions tailored to you. Book now.

blocks.heading: Uncover AI Opportunities in a **3-day Workshop**
blocks.description: In this intensive engagement, our AI strategists work with your team to identify where AI can drive real value... In just three days, you'll go from wondering about AI to having a clear, actionable implementation roadmap.

features.heading: Why Businesses Struggle with AI
features.description: Every business leader knows AI is transformative, but we often hear: "We don't know where to start”, “We lack internal expertise”, “We're worried about wasting money”, “We need a strategy, not just tools”

features.heading: Improving your Workflows
features.description: We don't just talk theory; we embed ourselves in your business… a hands-on process led by senior AI consultants and developers

features.heading: Day 1 - Explore & Ideate
features.description: In-depth interviews with stakeholders; understand pain points and your environment

features.heading: Day 2 - Analysis & Feasability
features.description: Map pain points to AI solutions: assess data readiness, integration complexity and feasability

features.heading: Day 3 - Roadmap & Next Steps
features.description: Prioritize initiatives, build implementation roadmap and timeline, present recommendations to align team

blocks.heading: What you Walk Away With
blocks.body: By the end, you'll have a prioritized list of AI projects, and a step-by-step plan to implement them

cards.heading: 1️⃣ Easy Wins
cards.description: We'll map out the low effort, high impact integrations for routine tasks. Expect immediate results where we see the opportunities.

cards.heading: 2️⃣ Medium Projects
cards.description: Projects that require some integration or light development work, typically connect AI into your existing systems, automate multi-step workflows, or enhance internal tools. Expect meaningful efficiency gains and measurable ROI within weeks.

cards.heading: 3️⃣ Transformational Ideas
cards.description: High-impact initiatives that reshape how your business operates. These are end-to-end AI solutions, new product capabilities, or major process redesigns that unlock entirely new value. These projects require deeper data work and engineering, but deliver genuine competitive advantage.

blocks.heading: At a Glance
blocks.description: A 3-day, on-site workshop to get to understand your businesses workflows, and identify where AI can drive value

features.heading: $12,000 + GST
features.description: Includes 2 Senior AI Consultants on-site for 3 full days

features.heading: Deep Business Understanding
features.description: We interview stakeholders, map processes, and analyse pain points across your teams

features.heading: Prioritised AI Roadmap
features.description: A clear set of recommended initiatives ranked by value, feasibility, and ROI

features.heading: Tailored to Your Stack
features.description: We identify solutions that fit your environment: Microsoft, AWS, OpenAI, Gemini & more

accordionItems.label: Is this an AI training workshop or a consulting engagement
accordionItems.content: This is a strategic consulting engagement, not a training course. Instead of teaching generic AI tools, we work with your team to map your processes, identify specific AI opportunities, and design a practical implementation roadmap tailored to your business.

accordionItems.label: Who should attend the 3-day workshop?
accordionItems.content:
We recommend a mix of business and technical stakeholders, for example:

* An executive sponsor (e.g. CEO, COO, CTO)
* Key business process owners (Operations, Sales, HR, Finance, etc.)
* Someone who understands your current systems and data (IT/architect)
* Individuals experiencing day-to-day pains with cumbersome processes

Ideally 4–8 people who can commit for most of the 3 days.

accordionItems.label: Do we need any AI knowledge or preparation beforehand?
accordionItems.content: No AI expertise is required. You bring knowledge of your business, processes, and pain points – we bring the AI experience. Before the workshop we’ll share a short checklist (key systems, current pain points, any existing AI tools), but there’s no heavy pre-work.

accordionItems.label: What do we actually get at the end of the 3 days?
accordionItems.content:
You’ll walk away with a concrete AI strategy pack, typically including:

* A prioritized list of AI use cases for your business
* Quick-win recommendations using out-of-the-box tools
* High-level designs for any proposed custom solutions
* A phased implementation roadmap with effort/complexity indicators
* Clear next steps and options for implementation

accordionItems.label: What happens after the workshop – do we have to use SSW for implementation?
accordionItems.content:
You have complete flexibility. You can:

* Execute the roadmap with your internal team
* Engage SSW to help design and build the AI solutions
* Use a hybrid approach, where we tackle the complex pieces and your team handles simpler items
* The deliverables are yours to use however you choose, with no lock-in.

blocks.heading: Ulysses Maclaren
blocks.description: Uly brings 20+ years of enterprise consulting experience, helping companies adopt emerging technology with confidence. He’s led AI enablement sessions for businesses looking to cut through the hype and build systems that drive measurable outcomes.

blocks.heading: Built on Real-World AI Delivery
blocks.body: SSW isn’t guessing. We’ve been building and fixing AI systems for years, across industries, tech stacks, and use cases. This workshop distills the lessons that save teams time, money, and frustration.

cards.description: SSW’s Gert Marx joins Chris Simon at NDC Melbourne to break down the latest on Contextive, the open-source tool helping devs write code that better aligns with business needs.
At NDC, Ulysses Maclaren talks with Richard Campbell about AI’s growing energy demands, Microsoft’s nuclear plans, and the massive infrastructure shifts behind our data-hungry future.
Ulysses shares best practices for responsible AI: transparency, critical thinking, privacy, and using AI to actually boost productivity and stay ahead in your career.

blocks.heading: Equip your team with **essential AI skills**
